snippet: Bruce Springsteen thrilled a crowd of VIPs at the Apollo Theater in Harlem Friday night, stomping through angry folk-rock tunes and doing a few soul tunes to honor the place where he was standing.
abstract: Bruce Springsteen thrilled a crowd of VIPs at the Apollo Theater in Harlem Friday night, stomping through angry folk-rock tunes and doing a few soul tunes to honor the place where he was standing.

headline.main: The Boss Pays Tribute to Soul, and Rocks the Apollo, Too
